name: Metal Invader
description:
You are playing Bragi the Bard of Asgard. She is shipwrecked on a planet full of Frost Punks. After your arrival you try to bring these punks some proper Metal with your mighty guitar.

Controls
WASDArrowsGamepadMoveA/DLeft/RightLeft Stick
JumpWUpButton South
AttackSHIFTLeft-ClickRight Trigger
Credits

Ann-Kathrin Raab - Character Art
Stefan Gores - Sound & Music
Andreas Buhs - Guitar
Manuel Buß - Programming & Level Design
